This is the full list of sites I have tested with. If you would like
your favorite site added please send the url to the freevo-users list.
Please attempt to test yourself and note your success or lack thereof
in your email to the list.

HEADLINES_LOCATIONS = [ ("Advogato", "http://advogato.org/rss/articles.xml"),
("BBC Front Page News","http://news.bbc.co.uk/rss/newsonline_world_edition/front_page/rss091.xml")
("Dictionary.com Word of the Day", "http://www.dictionary.com/wordoftheday/wotd.rss"),
("DVD Review", "http://www.dvdreview.com/rss/newschannel.rss"),
("Footnotes - GNOME News", "http://www.gnomedesktop.org/backend.php"),
("Freshmeat", "http://freshmeat.net/backend/fm.rdf"),
("Internet.com", "http://headlines.internet.com/internetnews/prod-news/news.rss"),
("HispaLinux", "http://www.hispalinux.es/backend.php"),
("KDE Dot News", "http://dot.kde.org/rdf"),
("Kuro5hin", "http://www.kuro5hin.org/backend.rdf"),
("Linux Games", "http://linuxgames.com/bin/mynetscape.pl"),
("Linux Today", "http://linuxtoday.com/backend/my-netscape.rdf"),
("Linux Weekly News", "http://lwn.net/headlines/rss"),
("Memepool", "http://memepool.com/memepool.rss"),
("Mozilla", "http://www.mozilla.org/news.rdf"),
("Mozillazine", "http://www.mozillazine.org/contents.rdf"),
("The Motley Fool", "http://www.fool.com/about/headlines/rss_headlines.asp"),
("Newsforge", "http://www.newsforge.com/newsforge.rss"),
("Pigdog", "http://www.pigdog.org/pigdog.rdf"),
("Punknews.org","http://punknews.org/feeds/punknews.rdf"),
("Python.org", "http://www.python.org/channews.rdf"),
("Quotes of the Day", "http://www.quotationspage.com/data/mqotd.rss"),
("Salon", "http://www.salon.com/feed/RDF/salon_use.rdf"),
("Slashdot", "http://slashdot.org/slashdot.rdf"),
("The Register", "http://www.theregister.co.uk/tonys/slashdot.rdf"),
("Web Reference", "http://www.webreference.com/webreference.rdf") ]
